thread.title: Martina C Garcia
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Martina C Garcia

author: Martina C Garcia
title: Martina C Garcia
text: I ordered the flowers for my mother in Germany and they arrived with a cute instruction card. The flowers stayed fresh for over 1 week. Great low prices for the flowers. Other online flower websites charge 3 times more. I definitely will use Euroflorist in the future. üíêüíï
